channel.title: Welcome to Project Nautilus on Pierre Aronnax
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Project Nautilus on Pierre Aronnax

item.title: Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) and Its Role in Future Security
item.description: The rapid advancement of quantum computing poses a significant threat to traditional cryptographic systems. Algorithms such as RSA, ECDSA, and Diffie-Hellman rely on mathematical problems that quantum computers will eventually solve efficiently, breaking encryption standards used today. Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) is being developed to mitigate this risk by introducing algorithms resistant to quantum attacks.

item.title: Nautilus and What is it about
item.description: Nautilus is a pioneering decentralized framework for developing dApps that utilize post-quantum cryptography (PQC) for security.

item.title: Why Does This Matter?
item.description: Nautilus empowers developers to build a new generation of decentralized applications with post-quantum security.

item.title: Why Choose Nautilus?
item.description: Nautilus is the first decentralized framework designed with post-quantum security, modular extensibility, and seamless interoperability.
